result.eng: Do you have any opinion on the matter?
result.ga: An bhfuil aon tuairim agat ar an ábhar
result.orig: An bhfuil aon tuairim agat ar an ábhar
result.html: An bhfuil aon tuairim agat ar an ábharDo you have any opinion on the matter?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil aon tuairim agat ar an áḃarDo you have any opinion on the matter?

result.eng: The price paid for sending material from Dublin to Cork.
result.ga: An praghas a íoctar ar ábhar a sheoladh ó Bhaile Átha Cliath go Corcaigh
result.orig: An praghas a íoctar ar ábhar a sheoladh ó Bhaile Átha Cliath go Corcaigh
result.html: An praghas a íoctar ar ábhar a sheoladh ó Bhaile Átha Cliath go CorcaighThe price paid for sending material from Dublin to Cork.
result.ponchtml: An praġas a íoctar ar áḃar a ẛeolaḋ ó Ḃaile Áṫa Cliaṫ go CorcaiġThe price paid for sending material from Dublin to Cork.

result.eng: I would like to say something on this matter.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ar an ábhar seo
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ar an ábhar seo
result.html: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ar an ábhar seoI would like to say something on this matter.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom rud éigin a rá ar an áḃar seoI would like to say something on this matter.

result.eng: What is the subject of the chapter?
result.html: Cad is ábhar don chaibidilWhat is the subject of the chapter?
result.ponchtml: Cad is áḃar don ċaibidilWhat is the subject of the chapter?

result.html: Díolann an comhlacht ábhar tógálaThe company sells building materials.
result.ponchtml: Díolann an coṁlaċt áḃar tógálaThe company sells building materials.

result.eng: I feel that it is a cause for concern.
result.html: Is ábhar imní dhom éI feel that it is a cause for concern.
result.ponchtml: Is áḃar imní ḋom éI feel that it is a cause for concern.

result.ga: Is ábhar le plé é seo
result.orig: Is ábhar le plé é seo
result.html: Is ábhar le plé é seoThis is open to discussion.
result.ponchtml: Is áḃar le plé é seoThis is open to discussion.

result.eng: That is the total extent of my knowledge on the subject.
result.ga: Sin iomlán m'eolais ar an ábhar
result.orig: Sin iomlán m'eolais ar an ábhar
result.html: Sin iomlán m'eolais ar an ábharThat is the total extent of my knowledge on the subject.

result.eng: The book gave me food for thought.
result.ga: Thug an leabhar ábhar machnaimh dom
result.orig: Thug an leabhar ábhar machnaimh dom
result.html: Thug an leabhar ábhar machnaimh domThe book gave me food for thought.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug an leaḃar áḃar maċnaiṁ domThe book gave me food for thought.

result.eng: They gave the Irish-language community something to read.
result.ga: Chuir said ábhar léitheoireachta ar fáil do phobal na Gaeilge
result.orig: Chuir said ábhar léitheoireachta ar fáil do phobal na Gaeilge

result.eng: People get little satisfaction from recycling stuff that is already available elsewhere.
result.ga: Is beag sásamh a bhaintear as athchúrsáil a dhéanamh ar ábhar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile cheana féin

result.eng: He has something to cry about.
result.ga: Is aige atá ábhar na ndeor
